solution_line_template: Combining the three classes, there are {males_class1} + {males_class2} + {males_class3} = <<{males_class1}+{males_class2}+{males_class3}={total_male_students}>>{total_male_students} male students.

Thus, there are {total_female_students}-{total_male_students} = <<{total_female_students}-{total_male_students}={unpartnered_students}>>{unpartnered_students} students who cannot partner with a student of the opposite gender.
